description:
Lasting comfort on technical terrain. Designed for endurance, these shoes are engineered to deliver a soft ride from trailhead to treeline. The sole takes on technical trails and varied terrain, inspiring confidence with each strike. And a reinforced toe cap protects your feet from rocks and trail debris.

  • Breathable and durable Cordura® mesh upper with TPU reinforcements in high wear areas
  • Synthetic toe cap adds extra protection from rocks and trail debris
  • 4.5mm Dynamic Foam recycled EVA insert provides underfoot comfort without excess bulk
  • Blended EVA and polyolefin midsole absorbs shock with responsive energy return
  • Flat laces and integrated lace pocket
  • Vibram® LiteBase sole with Megagrip rubber provides reliable traction on technical terrain
name: Arc'teryx Norvan LD 3 Trail Running Shoes - Men's
